00103         float Vector2D::operator*(const Vector2D &other) const
00104         {
00105             return x * other.x + y * other.y;

00118         float Vector2D::getSquaredLength() const
00119         {
00120             return (*this) * (*this);
00121         }
00122 
00123         float Vector2D::getLength() const
00124         {
00125             return sqrt(getSquaredLength());
00126         }
00127 
00128         void Vector2D::setLength(float length)
00129         {
00130             float l = getLength();
00131             if(l != (float) 0) {
00132                 *this /= l;
00133                 *this *= length;
00134             }
00135         }
00136 
00137         float Vector2D::getDistance(const Vector2D &other) const
00138         {
00139             return sqrt((x - other.x) * (x - other.x) +
00140                         (y - other.y) * (y - other.y));
00141         }
00142 
00143         Vector2D Vector2D::normalized() const
00144         {
00145             return *this / getLength();
00146         }
00147 
00148         Vector2D Vector2D::inverted() const
00149         {
00150             return Vector2D(1.0f / x, 1.0f / y);
00151         }
00152 
00153         Vector2D Vector2D::reflect(const Vector2D &other) const
00154         {
00155             return (*this) * 2.0f - other;
00156         }
00157 
00158         float Vector2D::getAngle(const Vector2D &other) const
00159         {
00160             float abs = acos(normalized() * other.normalized());
00161             abs = 180.0f * abs / float(M_PI);
00162             return x * other.y - y * other.x >= 0.0f ? abs : -abs;
00163         }
00164 
00165         void Vector2D::fromXML(TiXmlElement *element, Vector2D *vector)
00166         {
00167             if(element) {
00168                 element->QueryFloatAttribute("x", &vector->x);
00169                 element->QueryFloatAttribute("y", &vector->y);
00170             }
00171         }
00172 
00173         Vector2D Vector2D::fromPolar(float radius, float theta)
00174         {
00175             MathManager *mathManager = MathManager::getInstance();
00176             return Vector2D(radius * cos(mathManager->toRadians(theta)),
00177                     radius * sin(mathManager->toRadians(theta)));
00178         }
00179     };
